column4: guys.. someone please help me with this X window system problem..
I've just upgraded to breezy and i still can't get X to run
and I get the same error
error:  could not open default font 'fixed';
then again, it's a development release.. oh well
i'd suggest checking that as well, if you can at least get to a command prompt.
yeah, I slapped knoppix on there, disabled gdm and rebooted
so I can get that much now
just running knoppix live, or you installed it?
nono.. I just used knoppix to mount the hda1 to remove +x bit off of the gdm script
otherwise X kept crashing and locking the keyboard
which is pretty nasty i would say
